title: Awards
text:

title: Projects
text:
State Marijuana Laws and Traffic Fatalities

Objective: Examine the relation between traffic fatalities and state marijuana laws
Data: Medical Marijuana Laws data and Traffic fatalities from FARS
Method: Poisson Regression in STATA



HOT Lanes with a Refund Option

Objective: Investigate travelers attitudes towards a possible refund option for priced managed lanes
Data: Stated Preference Survey Data
Method: Structural Equation Models and Multinomial Logit Models using MPlus and NLOGIT



Prioritizing Emissions Mitigation Strategies at Mariposa Port of Entry

Objective: Quantification of emission profiles at border crossings to reduce air pollution
Data: Vehicle trajectory data collected at the Port of Entry in Nogales, AZ
Method: Simulation Models in VISSIM and emissions analysis in MOVES



Macroscopic and Microscopic Analysis of Traffic Hysteresis

Objective: Investigate the phenomenon of traffic hysteresis in freeway traffic flow
Data: Vehicle trajectory data from NGSIM
Method: MATLAB



Countermeasures to Reduce Large Truck Crashes

Objective: Identify hot spots for large truck crashes in Arizona and recommend potential countermeasures
Data: Crash Data
Method: Count Models (Negative Binomial Regression and Poisson Regression) in **LIMDEP/NLOGIT

title: Sravani Vadlamani
text: Please feel free to use the tabs above to get to know more about me and reach out if you would like to have a chat!

title: About Me
text: I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Data Science and Business Analytics at Florida Polytechnic University. Prior to joining academia, I obtained my degrees in engineering, statistics and Geographic Information Systems from Arizona State University. I have also worked as a Transportation Engineer for the Maryland State Highway Administration (SHA). If you would like to know the story of someone who was scared of math and numbers till high school but succeeded in college and professionally feel free to reach out!

title: About Me
text:

PhD in Civil Engineering (Transportation Engineering)

title: About Me
text:
Hobbies
I am passionate about yoga and meditation. I completed my 200 hour yoga teacher training and plan on doing the 300 hour training. I also love to spend time outdoors hiking and on the beach.



I have been trying to kindle the artistic side of my brain by attending an adult art class (funfact: I barely passed my drawing classes in elementary and middle school üòÅ).
